page.title: 19Galleyhill Centre(cont)
page.content: Pottery-People make models with clay and fire them to make them hard.Then they glaze them to stop them cracking. It would take a full day to do this. Metalwork-With metal,people can make clocks,watches and ornamental steam- engines.Metalwork has very complicated machinery. Woodwork-With wood people can make tables,cabinets and life-sized boats. People can also make smaller toys for Christmas. Computers-Many students work on the computers.Also business-men use them. Youngsters play games on them and learn to use them. Photography-People develop films in the dark room.People have to pay more money for colour films than black and white. Photography is a very popular subject because better equipment has been invented.
